trans-unit.resname: PLG20·1 | Reliquary Tower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.\n{T}: Add {C}.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。 {T}：加{C}。

trans-unit.source: "The tower isn't the structure itself. It is all of us, and the wisdom we share. It grows ever upward, a stone for every new arrival."\n—Archmage Vintra
trans-unit.target: 「这塔并不只是一座建物，而是我们所有人，我们所分享之智慧的象征。每位新人到来都会为其添砖加瓦，促其不断攀高。」 ～大法师薇卓拉

trans-unit.resname: PLG20·2 | Hangarback Walker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物。 当CARDNAME死去时，其上每有一个+1/+1指示物，便派出一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物。 {1}，{T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。
